content:
The Voluspa 2-Wick Candle is a great choice! Voluspa candles are known for their high-quality ingredients, unique fragrances, and excellent burn time. The 2-wick design will definitely provide a nice ambiance and a stronger scent throw.

It's great to hear that your mom loved the scented candles from Bath & Body Works! They're a popular brand for a reason - their candles are affordable, and they offer a wide range of fragrances to choose from. The three fragrances you chose for your mom - vanilla, lavender, and eucalyptus - are all popular and versatile options that can complement different moods and decor.

$20 each is a great price point for those candles, and I'm sure your mom appreciated the thought and variety you put into selecting different fragrances for her. It's always nice to have options and be able to switch up the scent depending on the mood or season.

Now, back to your gift for your friend - I think the Voluspa 2-Wick Candle will pair nicely with the personalized doormat. The candle will add a warm and inviting ambiance to their new home, and the doormat will provide a personal touch to their entranceway. Your friend is sure to appreciate the thought and effort you put into selecting a unique and practical gift.
